name: voiceit-api-2-cordova-demo
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that shows the integration of cordova-plugin-voiceit-api-2
author: Apache Cordova Team

cordova-plugin-voiceit-api-2.MICROPHONE_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: This app needs to access to your microphone for voice biometrics
cordova-plugin-voiceit-api-2.CAMERA_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: This app needs to access to your camera for face biometrics
